šum-ma a-wi-lum <sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub>-šu a-na nukaribbim(NU.<sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub>) a-na ru-ku-bi-im id-di-in nukaribbum(NU.<sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub>) a-di <sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub> ṣa-ab-tu i-na bi-la-at KIRI<sub>6</sub> ši-it-ti-in a-na be-el KIRI<sub>6</sub> i-na-ad-di-in ša-lu-uš-tam šu-ú i-le-qé
